title: Active Directory (com.apple.DirectoryService.managed)
description: The payload that configures an Active Directory (AD) domain.

HostName.title: HostName
HostName.description: The Active Directory domain to join.

UserName.title: UserName
UserName.description: The user name of the account for the domain.

Password.title: Password
Password.description: The password of the account for the domain.

ADOrganizationalUnit.title: ADOrganizationalUnit
ADOrganizationalUnit.description: The organizational unit to add the joining computer object to.

ADCreateMobileAccountAtLoginFlag.title: Enable ADCreateMobileAccountAtLogin Flag
ADCreateMobileAccountAtLoginFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADCreateMobileAccountAtLogin' key.

ADCreateMobileAccountAtLogin.title: Create mobile account at login
ADCreateMobileAccountAtLogin.description: If 'true', the system creates a mobile account at login.

ADWarnUserBeforeCreatingMAFlag.title: Enable ADWarnUserBeforeCreatingMA Flag
ADWarnUserBeforeCreatingMAFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADWarnUserBeforeCreatingMA' key.

ADWarnUserBeforeCreatingMA.title: Require confirmation before creating mobile account
ADWarnUserBeforeCreatingMA.description: If 'true', the system enables the warning before creating the mobile account.

ADForceHomeLocalFlag.title: Enable ADForceHomeLocal Flag
ADForceHomeLocalFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADForceHomeLocal' key.

ADForceHomeLocal.title: Force local home directory on startup disk
ADForceHomeLocal.description: If 'true', the system forces a local home directory.

ADUseWindowsUNCPathFlag.title: Enable ADUseWindowsUNCPath Flag
ADUseWindowsUNCPathFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADUseWindowsUNCPath' key.

ADUseWindowsUNCPath.title: Use UNC path for network home location
ADUseWindowsUNCPath.description: If 'true', the system uses the UNC path from Active Directory to derive the network home location.

ADMountStyle.title: Mount Style
ADMountStyle.description: The network home protocol to use: 'afp' or 'smb'.

ADDefaultUserShellFlag.title: Enable ADDefaultUserShell Key
ADDefaultUserShellFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADDefaultUserShell' key.

ADMapUIDAttributeFlag.title: Enable ADMapUIDAttribute Key
ADMapUIDAttributeFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADMapUIDAttribute' key.

ADMapGIDAttributeFlag.title: Enable ADMapGIDAttribute Key
ADMapGIDAttributeFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADMapGIDAttribute' key.

ADMapGGIDAttributeFlag.title: Enable ADMapGGIDAttribute Key
ADMapGGIDAttributeFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADMapGGIDAttributeFlag' key.

ADMapGGIDAttribute.title: Map group GID to attribute
ADMapGGIDAttribute.description: The map group GID to attribute.

ADPreferredDCServerFlag.title: Enable ADPreferredDCServer Key
ADPreferredDCServerFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADPreferredDCServer' key.

ADDomainAdminGroupListFlag.title: Enable ADDomainAdminGroupList Key
ADDomainAdminGroupListFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADDomainAdminGroupList' key.

ADDomainAdminGroupList.title: Allow administration by specified Active Directory groups.
ADDomainAdminGroupList.description: The list of Active Directory groups with admin access.

ADAllowMultiDomainAuthFlag.title: Enable ADAllowMultiDomainAuth Key
ADAllowMultiDomainAuthFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADAllowMultiDomainAuth' key.

ADAllowMultiDomainAuth.title: Allow authentication from any domain in the forest
ADAllowMultiDomainAuth.description: If 'true', the system allows authentication from any domain in the namespace.

ADNamespaceFlag.title: Enable ADNamespace Key
ADNamespaceFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADNamespace' key.

ADNamespace.title: Set primary user account naming convention: "forest" or "domain"
ADNamespace.description: The primary user account naming convention; either 'forest' or 'domain'.

ADPacketSignFlag.title: Enable ADPacketSign Key
ADPacketSignFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADPacketSign' key.

ADPacketEncryptFlag.title: Enable ADPacketEncrypt Key
ADPacketEncryptFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADPacketEncrypt' key.

ADRestrictDDNSFlag.title: Enable ADRestrictDDNS Key
ADRestrictDDNSFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADRestrictDDNS' key.

items.title: Allowed DDNS Interface Item
items.description: An interface name which is allowed to make DDNS updates

ADRestrictDDNS.title: Restrict DDNS on interfaces
ADRestrictDDNS.description: An array of strings that represent the interfaces allowed for dynamic DNS updates, such as en0 and en1.

ADTrustChangePassIntervalDaysFlag.title: Enable ADTrustChangePassIntervalDays Key
ADTrustChangePassIntervalDaysFlag.description: If 'true', the system enables the 'ADTrustChangePassIntervalDays' key.

ADTrustChangePassIntervalDays.title: Password trust interval
ADTrustChangePassIntervalDays.description: The number of days before requiring a change of the computer trust account password. Set to '0' to disable the feature.
